resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106765</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106765</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201882</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Women in the Bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Frauen in der Bibel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Femmes dans la bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mulheres no bible</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Donne in bibbia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γυναίκες στη Βίβλο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mujeres en la biblia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The module contains the following levels: Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah and Hannah Rahab, Elizabeth and Mary Magdalene Michal, Hagar and Miriam Mary (Mother of Jesus), Mothers and Queens Daughters of Zelophehad, Concubines and Sisters Widows, wives and mothers of kings </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Modul enthält die folgenden Stufen: 
Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah und Hannah Rahab, 
Elizabeth und Mary Magdalene Michal, Hagar und Miriam Mary (Mutter von
Jesus), Mütter und Königin-Töchter von Zelophehad, Konkubinen und 
Schwester-Witwen, Frauen und Mütter der Könige</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le module contient les niveaux suivants : 
Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah et Hannah 
Rahab, Elizabeth et Mary Magdalene Michal, Hagar et Miriam Mary 
(mère de Jésus), mères et filles des Reines de Zelophehad, 
concubines et veuves de soeurs, épouses et mères des rois</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O módulo contem os seguintes níveis: 
Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah e Hannah Rahab, 
Elizabeth e Mary Magdalene Michal, Hagar e Miriam Mary (matriz de 
Jesus), matrizes e filhas das rainhas de Zelophehad, concubines e 
viúvas das irmãs, esposas e matrizes dos reis</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il modulo contiene i seguenti livelli: 
Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah e Hannah Rahab, 
Elizabeth e Mary Magdalene Michal, Hagar e Miriam Mary (madre di 
Jesus), madri e derivati delle regine di Zelophehad, concubines e 
vedove delle sorelle, mogli e madri dei re</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ενότητα περιέχει τα ακόλουθα επίπεδα: 
Θ*Εστχερ, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah 
και Hannah Rahab, Elizabeth και Mary Magdalene 
Michal, Hagar και Miriam Mary (μητέρα του Ιησού), 
μητέρες και βασίλισσες Daughters των χηρών Zelophehad, 
Concubines και αδελφών, των συζύγων και των μητέρων των 
βασιλιάδων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El módulo contiene los niveles siguientes: 
Esther, Jezebel, Ruth, Rachel Tamar, Delilah y Hannah Rahab, 
Elizabeth y Maria Magdalene Michal, Hagar y Miriam Maria (madre de 
Jesús), madres e hijas de las reinas de Zelophehad, concubines y 
viudas de las hermanas, esposas y madres de reyes</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:HOSANEE R.M
FN:HOSANEE R.M
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201882</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106765</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/women-in-the-bible</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
